function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate housing conditions leading to poor indoor air quality","Impact":"Increased chances of respiratory problems, asthma, and other health issues","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and upkeep of housing conditions, affordable ventilation system repairs","Technologies":"High-efficiency HVAC systems, air purifiers, mold detectors","People":"Low-income households, minority groups","Owner":"Local housing authorities, government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Residential segregation based on race and ethnicity","Impact":"Higher likelihood of health issues and disease among impacted populations","Mitigation":"Addressing racial segregation, improving housing access for minority groups","Technologies":"Community planning, affordable housing initiatives, anti-discrimination measures","People":"African American and Hispanic groups","Owner":"Government, community organizations, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Higher level of indoor air pollutants in African American and Hispanic houses","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory problems and other health issues","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, housing maintenance","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality sensors, mold detectors","People":"African American and Hispanic households","Owner":"Local housing authorities, community organizations"}]}
